Description: Fragment of ledge rim and wall of pottery bowl. Coarse, red (2.5 YR 5/6) clay with much silver mica. On top of rim, white braided band; on the wall, wide, white horizontal stripe. Interior undecorated, with deep grooves.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.58, no. E5, pl. 28, no. 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IE.09)
